attributes.action: Free Medical and Dental treatment for Service Veterans
attributes.additional_details:
I would like to put forward that all Service Veterans should be entitled to free prescriptions and dental care for the remainder of their lives.
Service Veterans who have given valuable years for their country should be given this as a thank you from the country.
a large number of service personnel are injured during their service and carry those injuries for life. why should we have to pay for this?
